post:
HostMyThing is your premier web hosting company, specializing in everthing from web hosting to colocation services. Our team always puts the client first, and we back all of our services with a 45 day unconditional money back guarantee.


Rock Solid Infrastructure
Our nodes are located in a brand new New York datacenter built in 2009 by ColoCrossing. ColoCrossing is a well-established company operating since 2003 that has been dedicated to providing quality dedicated & colocation services. Everything within the data center is N+1 redundant and emergency disaster recovery plans are in place. We are proud to say that we locate our servers in their facilities and that we look forward to many great years to come with them.

Ease of Use
HostMyThing uses Virtualizor as a VPS control panel. Virtualizor is a complete VPS Control Panel Management solution. This fully feature-packed control panel allows you to control every aspect of your virtual server and view it’s statistics. You can remotely boot, reboot, change hostname, shutdown, access SSH root access, and much more. Upon signup, you will be sent a welcome email with your very own login information to Virtualizor. The same goes for dedicated servers. Upon deployment, you will receive login information to our dedicated server control panel, allowing you to remotely view stats, bandwidth, assign RDNS, and even reboot your server. Both control panels are so lightweight and easy to use that anyone could use them!

So, with so many choices, why host with us?
HostMyThing.com is your premier web hosting company, everything from simple web hosting to Enterprise level Dedicated solutions. We guarantee our services will be reliable, and there when you need it. We back all of our hosting with a 40 day money-back guarantee. What sets HostMyThing apart from other hosts is our service – that’s the HMT Difference. We always put our clients first, no matter what the case. Our company is made up of a talented team of individuals who all love what they do, with years of experience under their belts. HostMyThing is unlike any other hosting provider out there. Period. Try the HMT difference, and see how we can work for you!

We accept most major credit cards and Paypal.

VPS Packages

Our approach to Open-VZ VPS
Many people believe Open-VZ based servers is just another way for incompetent web hosts to oversell their servers. Not at HMT. Here's our approach. Each VPS plan's guaranteed memory is counted towards our no-overselling guarantee. We never sell over 80% of our guaranteed memory to clients. In addition, we never sell over 80% of our servers' total disk space, although realistically it is never over 50% sold because of the amount of storage capacity we have in each node. This allows us to provide you with Rock Solid hosting at unbeatable prices.

All VPS plans come with:
  • Virtualizor VPS Control Panel
  • Rock Solid RAID 10 Protected Disk Space
  • Fast Intel Based Servers
  • No-Overselling Guarantee.
  • Fast Setup (usually within 5 minutes of receiving payment)
  • Quality 24x7x365 Support via Chat(15 minute average response time)
  • Full Root Access
  • Ability to grow. We can add more RAM, Disk, and Bandwidth to your account "A la carte"
  • Choice of OS
  • 100% Uptime Record!

Money Back Guarantee
All of our Virtual Private Servers come with a risk-free 45-day money back guarantee. If for any reason you feel that our VPS hosting services are not right for you, simply request a refund within 45 days of your original purchase date and we’ll issue you a 100% full refund with no questions asked.

Want a custom VPS Quote?
Just fill out a sales request on our website, and we will be in touch.

VPS Special!
Use the promo code VPSWELCOME to receive 20% off your first invoice!
